description.narrative: table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } The Tobene expansion project consists of an increase in the installed capacity of the existing Tobene IPP (an HFO fired power plant convertible to gas operations in Senegal) from 96 MW to 115 MW, such that under its Power Purchase Agreement with Senelec it will provide increased a minimum guaranteed capacity, from 70 MW to 105 MW, including 115 MW for the peak demand during the peak season (i.e June to October). The expansion was awarded to Tobene Power SA on a negotiated basis by the Government of Senegal following the successful completion of the existing Tobene, currently owned and operated by the same company.

mailing-address.narrative: Melec PowerGen Inc Samer Nasr Managing Director +961-9 620920 Ext1200 / +961 9 620934 snasr@melecpowergen.com Corporate Headquarters: Matelec group - Anchit main road , Ghorfine - P.O Box: 12 Jbeil Lebanon

table, .k-table{ border-collapse:collapse; width:100%; table-layout:fixed; margin-bottom: 15px;} .k-table, .k-table td, table, table td {outline: 0;border: 1px solid #000; } .k-table td, table td { padding: 5px; } Tobene Power disclosed the local ESIA in accordance with the Senegalese requirements and the document was made available to the DEEC ( Department de lEnvironnement et des Etablissements Classés ).Documentation including background information updates was also made available during the ESIA.The EIA and ESIA are made available with this document and for further information on the project Tobene Power should be contacted as per the details above.

name.narrative: The project is located about 90 kilometers North East of Dakar - at Taiba Ndiaye - In Senegal. Since the early 2000s, this site had been identified by the Government of Senegal for its potential for thermal power plants development due to its great connection with the distribution network and its proximity with industrial areas and urban centers.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: V-AC - Heavy Fuel Oil - Thermal Power Generation

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
